page.title: 15EAST ALLINGTON FARMING
page.content: Lower Coombe Farm is 200 acres and I run it with the help of Les Jeffery and Nigel Tucker.We have a herd of 150 large white and landrace breading sows,selling pork to a local butcher,bacon to Totnes Bacon factory, breading pigs to other farmers.We grow 60 acres of barley,the pigs produce muck for the barley and the barley provides straw and grain for the pigs. We sell 70 acres of grass to other farmers for summer grazing.On the other 60 acres we run a pedigree herd of single suckled Simmental cattle.At present we have a total of 59 cattle. We have two cottages that are let during the summer to visitors and around the farm we have peacocks, pheasants and various ducks.
